The options are - company, educational institution, artist, athlete, office holder, mean of transportation, building, natural place, village, animal, plant, album, film or written work. Appomattox Regional Governor's School for the Arts And Technology -  The Appomattox Regional Governor's School for the Arts And Technology (locally and colloquially sometimes known as ARGS ARGSAT Appomattox or the Governor's School) is a public regional magnet high school in downtown Petersburg Virginia. One of 18 Virginia Governor's Schools it draws students from 14 localities: Chesterfield Richmond Petersburg Dinwiddie Colonial Heights Hopewell Prince George Powhatan Sussex Surry Charles City Amelia Southampton and Franklin City.
